又开始文字游戏了？1 你觉得中国会允许美国CDC专家去武汉吗？2 WHO的专家去了吧，去武汉了吗？都...

根据阁下的逻辑，别转移话题，解释下Trump派了CDC专家这消息哪来的？“去一趟大概就是免费操几个燕子吧”的消息哪来的？

我已经正面解释过了，在川粉正面回答以下问题之前，我没有义务回答川粉的问题：
先解释一下这个：
Trump cut crucial CDC job in China months before coronavirus pandemic
https://www.nydailynews.com/coronavirus/ny-coronavirus-trump-cut-crucial-cdc-job-months-before-pandemic-20200323-wd7vncvw4jhofkdaynom4776bu-story.html

Trump's staff cuts have undermined Covid-19 containment efforts, watchdog finds
https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2020/mar/24/trump-cuts-undermine-coronavirus-containment-cdc-watchdog-report
Over the past three years, the Trump administration has drastically reduced a team working in China to identify global health threats like Covid-19, which originated in the Chinese city of Wuhan late last year. The initiative’s 11 CDC staffers have been cut to three people, while 39 workers classed as “local employees” have been reduced to 11 people.

此外，川统领一开始不信CDC，相信中共，结果如大家所见


疫情爆发了，这个时候川统领开始扮演傻白甜，哪怕不算中国1月3号已经跟美国通过气了，按1月20日作为时间节点，也整整两个月过去了。这两个月里干的事情就只有一句“都被CCP骗了”？
